body_html: If it's still an orthogonal weight initialisation and a better version of it then I guess the only concern might be if it changes training behaviour for existing models. Even so we can just add it to the release notes. @alykhantejani I know this is used for the SR work - any thoughts?
body_text: If it's still an orthogonal weight initialisation and a better version of it then I guess the only concern might be if it changes training behaviour for existing models. Even so we can just add it to the release notes. @alykhantejani I know this is used for the SR work - any thoughts?
body: If it's still an orthogonal weight initialisation and a better version of it then I guess the only concern might be if it changes training behaviour for existing models. Even so we can just add it to the release notes. @alykhantejani I know this is used for the SR work - any thoughts?
